sentences.en: A stick of phosphorus fell on the floor.
An environmental friendly phosphorus - free degreaser is obtained by orthogonal test.
sentences.cn: 通过正交试验得到一种以表面活性剂为主、辅以助剂的环保无磷脱脂剂.

sentences.en: Annuals, as a general rule , are very responsive to phosphorus fertilization.
sentences.cn: 通常说来,对一年生植物施用磷肥是相当有效的.

sentences.en: Because scientists have found a bacterium that can do without phosphorus—live on arsenic instead.
sentences.cn: 因为科学家已经发现了一种细菌，可以无需磷生活而以砷代替。

sentences.en: Features Free of constituents such as halogen, antimony and red phosphorus.
sentences.cn: 特性不含卤素 、 锑、红磷等成分.

sentences.en: He says not only does arsenic belong under phosphorus, I predict that there is an element that lies below aluminum and above indium.
sentences.cn: 他认为不仅砷属于在磷下面，我预言还有一个元素,是在铝之上和铟的下边的。

sentences.en: Iron - nickel - phosphorus - boron quaternary alloy electroless plating on copper panel was described.
sentences.cn: 在铜基上化学镀铁 - 镍 - 磷 - 硼四元合金.

sentences.en: Meiban not prevent phosphorus and alkaline, low - foam, not damage fabrics.
sentences.cn: 防止霉斑不含磷和碱 、 泡沫低 、 不损伤织物.

sentences.en: Objective : Tri - isopropylated phenyl phosphate ester was synthesized from isopropylphenol and phosphorus oxychloride.
sentences.cn: 目的 用三异丙基苯酚和三氯氧磷为原料合成三异丙苯基磷酸酯.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the mechanism of hemorrhagic tendency after phosphorus poisoning.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨磷烧伤中毒的出血机理.

sentences.en: Phosphorus and boron act as glass flow temperature modifiers.
sentences.cn: 硼和磷作为玻璃流程温度修饰词.

sentences.en: Phosphorus is essential to plant growth.
Pig's bone has rich nutrition elements, such as mineral calcium and phosphorus.
sentences.cn: 猪骨富含营养, 尤其是钙、磷等矿物质含量很高.

sentences.en: These prevent the absorption of phosphorus in the diet.
sentences.cn: 这会组织食物中对磷的消化.

sentences.en: They say much of the soil lacks enough phosphorus and nitrogen.
sentences.cn: 他们说当地的大部分土壤缺乏足够的磷和氮.

sentences.en: This These prevent the absorption absorption of phosphorus in the diet.
sentences.cn: 这些植物盐会阻止动物吸收饲料中的磷.

sentences.en: When mixed with sulfur, phosphorus, and the kind of heat you get from, say, friction, it's very unstable.
sentences.cn: 当与硫磺、磷、你从某处获得的某种热量（比如说摩擦力）混合时，它就变得很不稳定。

sentences.en: Your body is 85 per cent water percent ash and phosphorus!
sentences.cn: 人体也不过是85%的水份加15%的骨灰和磷元素.

trans.tran_en: Phosphorus is a poisonous yellowish-white chemical element. It glows slightly, and burns when air touches it.
